Sentencas: A protective/conductive coating can be used to limit the formation of chromia in ferritic steel interconnects in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A study on the oxidation and electrical behavior of crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell interconnects with Ni-Co-CeO2 composite coating

Sentencas: One of the most promising candidates for restricting chromia formation is the addition of reactive elements oxides to the coating.
Titulo: A study on the oxidation and electrical behavior of crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell interconnects with Ni-Co-CeO2 composite coating

Sentencas: Here in, Ni-Co-CeO2 composite coating was applied to Crofer 22 APU alloy via the electroless method.
Titulo: A study on the oxidation and electrical behavior of crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell interconnects with Ni-Co-CeO2 composite coating

Sentencas: The oxidation and electrical behavior of uncoated and coated samples were evaluated at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: A study on the oxidation and electrical behavior of crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell interconnects with Ni-Co-CeO2 composite coating

Sentencas: The coating structure was examined by scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: A study on the oxidation and electrical behavior of crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell interconnects with Ni-Co-CeO2 composite coating

Sentencas: Results showed Cr2O3-scale thicknesses, and a reduction in oxidation rates for Ni-Co-CeO2-coated samples compared to uncoated samples.
Titulo: A study on the oxidation and electrical behavior of crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell interconnects with Ni-Co-CeO2 composite coating

Sentencas: Also, area specific resistance (ASR) results indicated that the formation of NiFe2O4, (Mn,Ni)(2)O-4, Co3O4, and CoFe2O4 compositions and the presence of CeO2 reduced ASR.
Titulo: A study on the oxidation and electrical behavior of crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell interconnects with Ni-Co-CeO2 composite coating

Sentencas: The ASR values of Ni-Co-CeO2 coated and uncoated Crofer 22 APU alloy after 300 h of isothermal oxidation at 800 degrees C was 11.8 m omega cm(2) and 35.7 m omega cm(2), respectively.
Titulo: A study on the oxidation and electrical behavior of crofer 22 APU solid oxide fuel cell interconnects with Ni-Co-CeO2 composite coating
